data.title: Beasley Media Group, LLC
data.text:
Beasley Media Group announces Mike Missanelli has returned to Middays on 97.5 The Fanatic in Philadelphia. The Mike Missanelli Show will now be heard Mondays – Fridays from 10 A.M. – 2 P.M. beginning on Monday, August 12, 2024. Missanelli’s extensive sports radio career has spanned over three decades in Philadelphia. “I am excited to welcome Mike […]

The National Association of Broadcasters (NAB) announced the finalists for the 2024 NAB Marconi Radio Awards in a live streamed video. The winners will be recognized and honored at radio’s biggest night, the Marconi Awards Dinner, where the industry’s major players come together to celebrate excellence and recognize stations and individuals. The dinner will be held October

Beasley Media Group announces Paul Blake has been promoted to Cluster Manager at Beasley Media Group Philadelphia. Blake most recently served as Vice President/Director of Sales and has been with the cluster for the past 22 years. In his new role, he will report directly to President Bruce Beasley and will be responsible for overseeing

New England Patriots and Beasley Media Group announce a multi-year broadcast extension with Beasley Media Group’s WBZ-FM/98.5 The Sports Hub today. The station has been the official flagship station of the New England Patriots since its inception in 2009. The New England Patriots games will continue to be broadcast through the 2033 season on Boston’s

Beasley Media Group announces Ashley McIntyre has been promoted to Local Sales Manager at the company’s Las Vegas-based radio properties. She officially began her new role on May 1, 2024. McIntyre most recently spent the past 11 years serving as a Senior Account Executive at the station. She began her radio career at Jack FM in Dallas,

Beasley Media Group announces Kyra Ringer has been named the Chief Engineer at the company’s Boston-based radio properties. Ringer most recently worked as an independent contract engineer in New England. Previously, she served as the Chief Engineer for Cumulus Media in Fort Walton Beach and Pensacola, Florida. In her new role, she will be responsible for

Beasley Media Group announces 93.3 WMMR’s Preston & Steve® Show Morning Personality Kathy Romano will host the 15th annual Kathy’s Cuts event to benefit Wigs for Kids. The event will take place on Monday, May 6, 2024 at three locations: Gravity Hair Salon Ambler, PA, David Arnold Salon in Jenkintown, PA, and VIBE Salon in Mt. Laurel, NJ. Wigs

Beasley Media Group’s Southwest Florida Radio Stations joined forces with Children’s Miracle Network to shine a spotlight on Golisano Children’s Hospital and raise crucial funds for pediatric healthcare. The event took place from 6:00AM – 6:00PM on Thursday, April 4th from the heart of Golisano Children’s Hospital, located at 9981 South Health Park Drive, Fort Myers,

Beasley Media Group proudly announces The Miller Lite “Party Off Park” Draft Viewing Party will take place on Wednesday, April 24th – Friday, April 26th off Park Street & Elizabeth Street behind Cliff Bell’s and Vollmers in Detroit. This FREE event will feature live music, food trucks, various vendors, DJ sets, and multiple screens broadcasting every moment

Beasley Media Group announces Tampa Bay’s biggest morning show personality MJ (Todd Schnitt) has signed a multiyear deal New MJ Morning Show on Q105. MJ originally joined the company in September 2020. No stranger to the Florida market, the veteran radio personality has been among the highest rated morning shows in Tampa Bay over the
